name: edenspiekermann-storybook-starter
description: Boilerplate repo for React-based component libraries

dependencies/comments.babel-cli: we transpile our components with Babel to make them compatible with browsers and the node.js require mechanism
dependencies/comments.classnames: assign conditional and multiple classnames to react components
dependencies/comments.prop-types: check type safety of react component props
dependencies/comments.rimraf: we use this to clean the dist folder before transpiling our modules

devDependencies/comments.@storybook/addon-actions: storybook addon to show events caused by components, e.g. button clicks
devDependencies/comments.@storybook/addon-backgrounds: storybook addon to display components on different background colors
devDependencies/comments.@storybook/addon-links: storybook addon to link component documentation pages together
devDependencies/comments.@storybook/addon-options: storybook addon to customize the generated docs page
devDependencies/comments.@storybook/addon-storyshots: storybook addon to gerate jest snapshots of all component variants
devDependencies/comments.autoprefixer: adds vendor prefixes to css to improve browser compatibility (uses 'browserslist' property in this file as reference)
devDependencies/comments.babel-preset-env: babel preset to add compatibility with newest ECMAScript versions
devDependencies/comments.babel-preset-react: babel preset to add compatibility with JSX
devDependencies/comments.babel-preset-stage-3: babel preset to add compatibility with newest stable JS features like the object spread operator
devDependencies/comments.enzyme-to-json: allows to create Jest snapshots from enzyme wrappers
devDependencies/comments.eslint: lints and partially fixes JavaScript code
devDependencies/comments.eslint-config-airbnb: the linting preset we use for JS
devDependencies/comments.eslint-config-prettier: can autoformat code and fix more linting errors
devDependencies/comments.eslint-plugin-jest: adds linting rules for better tests
devDependencies/comments.husky: adds git hooks to npm scripts (like precommit)
devDependencies/comments.import-glob-loader: enables importing of complete folders in scss via Webpack
devDependencies/comments.lint-staged: can run tasks (linting and unit tests) on staged files
devDependencies/comments.postcss-loader: we need postcss to use the autoprefixer
devDependencies/comments.raw-loader: we need this to import markdown files in our JS via Webpack
devDependencies/comments.react-test-renderer: used for testing rendered markup from components
devDependencies/comments.sass-loader: load scss file via Webpack and send it to node-sass
devDependencies/comments.sassdoc: generate documentation from annotated scss files
devDependencies/comments.storybook-readme: storybook addon to markdown documentation for components
devDependencies/comments.style-loader: inject css as style-tag into the page
devDependencies/comments.stylelint-config-sass-guidelines: the linting preset we use for (S)CSS
